Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5679 affecting package bind for versions less than 9.19.21-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-5679 affecting package bind for versions less than 9.19.21-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package bind is earlier than 9.19.21-1, affected by CVE-2023-5679
